function is_prime(n) result(res)

   integer, intent(in) :: n

   logical :: res

   if (n <=1) then

      res = .false. return

   elseif (n ==2) then

      res = .true.

      return

   elseif (mod(n,2) ==0) then

      res = .false. return

   end if

   integer :: i, sqrt_n

   sqrt_n = int(sqrt(real(n)))

   do i=3, sqrt_n, 2

      if (mod(n,i) ==0) then

         res = .false. return

      end if

   end do

   res = .true.

end function

function gcd(a,b) result(g)
   integer, intent(in) :: a, b
   integer :: g, a_abs, b_abs
   a_abs = abs(a)
   b_abs = abs(b)
   g = gcd_euclidean(a_abs, b_abs)
end function

function gcd_euclidean(a, b) result(g)
   integer, intent(in) :: a, b
   integer :: g
   integer :: temp
   g = a
   temp = b
   do while (temp /= 0)
      integer :: remainder = mod(g, temp)
      g = temp
      temp = remainder
   end do
end function

Alternatively, use the Euclidean algorithm. Function gcd(a, b):

integer function gcd(a, b)

   integer, intent(in) :: a, b

   integer :: temp, a_abs, b_abs

   a_abs = abs(a)

   b_abs = abs(b)

   gcd = a_abs

   temp = b_abs

   do while (temp /=0)

      integer :: remainder = mod(gcd, temp)

      gcd = temp

      temp = remainder

   end do

end function

Function gcd(a, b):

integer function gcd(a, b)

   integer, intent(in) :: a, b

   integer :: temp, a_abs, b_abs

   a_abs = abs(a)

   b_abs = abs(b)

   gcd = a_abs

   temp = b_abs

   do while (temp /=0)

      integer :: remainder = mod(gcd, temp)

      gcd = temp

      temp = remainder

   end do

end function

program main

   implicit none

   integer(8) :: x, y, a, b

   integer(8) :: value1, value2, final_result

   ! Read input

   read(*,*) x, y, a, b

   ! Compute value1

   integer(8) :: c, first_i, count_val

   integer(8) :: lcm_val

   integer(8) :: g = gcd(x,y)

   lcm_val = (x*y)/g

   if (lcm_val > b) then

      value1 =0

   else

      first_i = ((a + lcm_val -1)/lcm_val)*lcm_val

      if (first_i > b) then

         value1 =0

      else

         count_val = (b - first_i)/lcm_val +1

         value1 = count_val

      end if

   end if

   ! Now compute value2 from value1

   ! Second part

   integer(8) :: x_in = value1

   integer(8) :: newNumber =0

   integer(8) :: temp = x_in

   integer :: num_digits =0

   integer, dimension(100) :: digits ! assuming max digits is 100

   if (x_in ==0) then

      newNumber =0

   else

      num_digits =0

      do while (temp >0)

         integer(8) :: digit = mod(temp,10)

         integer(8) :: transformed

         if (9 - digit < digit) then

            transformed =9 - digit

         else

            transformed = digit

         end if

         num_digits = num_digits +1

         digits(num_digits) = transformed

         temp = temp /10

      end do

      newNumber =0

      integer :: i

      do i=1, num_digits

         newNumber = newNumber *10 + digits(i)

      end do

   end if

   value2 = newNumber

   ! Third part: compute final_result from value2

   integer(8) :: x_val = value2

   logical :: is_prime

   if (x_val ==2) then

      final_result =2

   else if (mod(x_val,2) ==0) then

      x_val =x_val +1

   end if

   do while (.true.)

      if (is_prime(x_val)) then

         exit

      else

         x_val =x_val +2

      end if

   end do

   final_result =x_val

   ! Output

   print*, final_result

contains

   integer function gcd(a, b)

      integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b

      integer(8) :: temp, a_abs, b_abs

      a_abs = abs(a)

      b_abs = abs(b)

      gcd = a_abs

      temp = b_abs

      do while (temp /=0)

         integer(8) :: remainder = mod(gcd, temp)

         gcd = temp

         temp = remainder

      end do

   end function

   logical function is_prime(n)

      integer(8), intent(in) :: n

      logical :: res

      if (n <=1) then

         res = .false.

      elseif (n ==2) then

         res = .true.

      elseif (mod(n,2) ==0) then

         res = .false.

      else

         integer(8) :: sqrt_n = int(sqrt(real(n)))

         integer(8) :: i

         res = .true.

         do i=3, sqrt_n, 2

            if (mod(n,i) ==0) then

               res = .false.

               exit

            end if

         end do

      end if

      is_prime = res

   end function

end program main
